mapper.sql: meeting_id, meeting_startTime, meeting_endTime, meeting_promoter, meeting_room, meeting_theme, meeting_state
mapper.insert: insert into meeting (meeting_id, meeting_startTime, meeting_endTime, meeting_promoter, meeting_room, meeting_theme, meeting_state) values (default, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{promoter.empId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{meetingRoom.meetingRoomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{meetingTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meetingState,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update meeting set meeting_startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, meeting_endTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, meeting_promoter = #{promoter.empId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, meeting_room = #{meetingRoom.meetingRoomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, meeting_theme = #{meetingTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meeting_state = #{meetingState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where meeting_id = #{meetingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT m.`meeting_id`,m.`meeting_startTime` ,m.`meeting_endTime`,m.`meeting_promoter`,m.`meeting_theme`,m.`meeting_state`,e.`emp_name`,mr.`meeting_room_name`,mr.`meeting_room_location` FROM meeting m LEFT OUTER JOIN employee e ON m.`meeting_promoter`=e.`emp_id` LEFT OUTER JOIN meeting_room mr ON m.`meeting_room`=mr.`meeting_room_id` order by m.meeting_id LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}

select m.*, e.emp_id,e.emp_name, me.meeting_room_name,me.meeting_room_id from meeting m left outer join employee e on m.meeting_promoter=e.emp_id left outer join meeting_room me on m.meeting_room =me.meeting_room_id
where meeting_id = #{meetingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select * from meeting order by meeting_id

SELECT count(*) FROM meeting m LEFT OUTER JOIN employee e ON m.`meeting_promoter`=e.`emp_id` LEFT OUTER JOIN meeting_room mr ON m.`meeting_room`=mr.`meeting_room_id`
and meeting_id=#{meetingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and instr(emp_name,#{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})!=0
and meeting_state LIKE CONCAT('%',#{meetingState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and meeting_startTime LIKE #{startTime}
and meeting_theme LIKE CONCAT('%',#{meetingTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and meeting_room_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{meetingRoomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and meeting_room_location LIKE CONCAT('%',#{meetingRoomLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
